description.value:
As Full Action, make +10 Tech-Use Test to teleport user and any number of accompanying Necrons within 10 metres to anywhere within 200m. If test failed, arrive 1d10m from intended destination, scattered randomly.

Requirements

Rarely gifted to Necron Royalty by specialised Crypteks. Always Best Quality. Xenotech.

Effect: Unique

Notes: -
